item.title: I-40 East - Exit 196
item.description: I-40 East approaching Exit 196 - NM-41/Howards Cavasos Blvd. The I-40 sign in the background is pretty common on I-40 east out of Albuquerque.

item.title: NM-41 South Approaching NM-55
item.description: NM-41 South approaching NM-55 in Estancia.

item.title: NM-41 South at BL-40
item.description: NM-41 south at BL-40 in Moriarty. Use BL-40 west for Albuquerque; use BL-40 east for Clines Corners. Continue south on NM-41 for Estancia.

item.title: NM-41 South at I-40 East
item.description: NM-41 South at I-40 East onramp to Santa Rosa. Continue south on NM-41 for Estancia.

item.title: NM-41 South at I-40
item.description: NM-41 south at I-40 (Exit 196) junction. Use I-40 west for Albuquerque; use I-40 east for Clines Corners. Continue south on NM-41 for Estancia.

item.title: NM-41 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NM-41 south to Moriarty and Estancia.

item.title: NM-41 South at NM-472
item.description: NM-41 south at NM-472 west to Cedar Grove and Edgewood.

item.title: US-285 South at NM-41
item.description: US-285 South at NM-41 in rural Santa Fe County.
